text:
A pleasant life truly!... It so happens that I have an Italian who is perhaps the best writing this letter he heard of the fall of the Whigs, and the temporary assumption of the government by the Duke of Wellington.
A pleasqnt lile tm/y!... It so hrppns tht I have qn 1t9/ign sho is pehsgs ThL xjt Nq1kf cLe Chqmbie #qf evs w9s. Bht he hqs not Cne s0rd OF Eng1ioh.'Whjle he wgj NTihing This /ej4ehr heqrc of the fq// oF the Whigy 9nd Thl Kemgorgry 9Synmption oF The government by the Dnke of LeMingfon.
